_xResult.title: Mira Linen Tunic
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made long linen tunic with open back
_xResult.longdesc:
This custom made tunic is a perfect layering staple to add to your closet this season. The linen is washed and softened so you know it won't shrink. The open back, boat neckline, quarter length sleeves, side slits and a shorter hem in the front are all details that make this seemingly simple garment stand out when you wear it. 

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric is already washed and softened and will shrink no more.
